text: Roberto Suazo Córdova (17 March 1927 - 22 December 2018) was a Honduran politician. He served as President of Honduras from 1982 to 1986. He was born in La Paz, Honduras. Córdova died on 22 December 2018 at a hospital in Tegucigalpa, Honduras from complications of stomach surgery at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:North American politicians Category:Presidents of Honduras Category:Surgeons
title: Roberto Suazo Córdova
